custom_voice.title: Custom Voice
custom_voice.description: Generate speech with preset speakers. You can also specify emotions and instructions.

instruction_input.label: Additional Instruction (Optional)
instruction_input.placeholder: e.g., Speak in a whisper, Speak slowly

voice_design.title: Voice Design
voice_design.description: Describe voice characteristics in text to generate matching speech. Voice descriptions should be written in English.

voice_description.label: Voice Design Instruction
voice_description.placeholder: Describe the voice characteristics in English
voice_description.info: Describe the voice characteristics in English

calm_male.name: Calm Middle-aged Male
calm_male.description: A calm, composed middle-aged male voice with a warm, resonant tone and measured pacing.

energetic_female.name: Energetic Young Female
energetic_female.description: An energetic, bright young female voice with lively intonation and enthusiastic delivery.

professional_narrator.name: Professional Narrator
professional_narrator.description: A professional, clear narrator voice with perfect diction and authoritative presence.

gentle_grandmother.name: Gentle Grandmother
gentle_grandmother.description: A gentle, warm elderly female voice with soft tones and a nurturing quality.

powerful_announcer.name: Powerful Announcer
powerful_announcer.description: A powerful, commanding announcer voice with strong projection and dramatic flair.

cute_girl.name: Cute Young Girl
cute_girl.description: A cute, sweet young girl voice with high pitch, playful tone and innocent charm.

voice_clone.title: Voice Clone
voice_clone.description: Clone a voice from reference audio and synthesize new text with it.
voice_clone.notice: Note: Voice Clone requires the Base model (~3.8GB), which is downloaded automatically on first use.

reference_text.label: Reference Audio Text (transcript)
reference_text.placeholder: Required when x-vector only mode is OFF

xvector_only.label: x-vector Only Mode (no text required, but lower quality)

tips.title: Tips
items: Reference audio should be at least 3 seconds of clear audio with minimal noise
More accurate reference text leads to better cloning quality
x-vector only mode doesn't require text input but produces lower quality
Cross-language cloning is possible, but same-language yields the best quality

prompt_save_load.save_description: Upload reference audio and text to save as a reusable voice prompt file.
prompt_save_load.load_description: Load a saved voice prompt file and synthesize new text with it.

flash_attn.title: Attention Implementation
flash_attn.note_windows: Note: FlashAttention 2 is not available on Windows. Use --no-flash-attn option to use SDPA instead.

technical_info.title: Technical Notes (Windows)
technical_info.content:
### Windows-Specific Notes

- **FlashAttention 2**: Not available on Windows. Use `--no-flash-attn` option for SDPA
- **SoX**: Not required (warnings can be ignored)
- **Encoding**: Use `chcp 65001` or UTF-8 settings for proper display
- **Symlinks**: Enable Developer Mode or ignore warnings

### RTX 50 Series (Blackwell)

- PyTorch stable does not support sm_120; nightly build (cu128) is required
- `pip install --pre torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cu128`
- torchao version mismatch warnings can be safely ignored

messages.enter_voice_description: Please enter a voice design instruction
messages.reference_text_required:
Reference text is required when x-vector only mode is OFF.
If text is unknown, enable x-vector only mode (quality will be reduced).
messages.whisper_unavailable: Whisper model is not available. Please install faster-whisper.
messages.upload_prompt_file: Please upload a voice prompt file

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text:
**Disclaimer**
- This audio is automatically generated/synthesized by an AI model and is provided for demonstration purposes only. It may contain inaccurate or inappropriate content and does not represent the views of the developer.
- Users assume all risks and responsibilities regarding the use and distribution of generated audio.
- Intentional generation of illegal, harmful, defamatory, fraudulent, deepfake, or privacy/copyright-infringing content is prohibited.
